message: I have a great deal for you, Bob! This product is a rare find, and I'm willing to let it go for a steal. I'll sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save even more. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
I can see you're a savvy negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more profit. I can do $87.50, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $82.50 for the product. Can you consider that?
I'm starting to think you're trying to drive a hard bargain, Bob! But I'm not willing to go any lower than $88. I'll give you a slight discount, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $84 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?
I'm starting to think you're getting a bit desperate, Bob! But I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. I'll sell it to you for $86, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $83 for the product. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to think we're not going to see eye to eye, Bob. I'll make one final offer: I'll sell it to you for $85.50, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $83.50 for the product. This is my last offer, and I hope you can meet me halfway.
